title: Tata Power awards contracts worth Rs 11,481 crore to local suppliers
description: Tata Power-led Odisha Discoms have awarded contracts worth Rs 11,481 crore to local contractors and suppliers over the past three years. These contracts, aimed at materials and services, have been given to 6,645 local vendors, boosting local employment and supporting the Make in Odisha vision.
